mapper.insert:
insert into enterprise_master_data.workshop(workshop_no, workshop_name, department_id, head_id, workshop_area, enable_status, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.workshopNo}, #{entity.workshopName}, #{entity.departmentId}, #{entity.headId}, #{entity.workshopArea}, #{entity.enableStatus}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into enterprise_master_data.workshop(workshop_no, workshop_name, department_id, head_id, workshop_area, enable_status, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.workshopNo}, #{entity.workshopName}, #{entity.departmentId}, #{entity.headId}, #{entity.workshopArea}, #{entity.enableStatus}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update workshop_no = values(workshop_no) , workshop_name = values(workshop_name) , department_id = values(department_id) , head_id = values(head_id) , workshop_area = values(workshop_area) , enable_status = values(enable_status) , remark_info = values(remark_info) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
